description: Limit an account's ability to place concurrent calls using flat rate trunks

allow_prepay.description: Determines if the account would like to allow per-minute calls if they have no available credit

authz_resource_types.description: List of Resource-Types that will authorize the call; bypassing limit checks and billing

burst_trunks.description: The number of two-way, flat-rate trunks used only if no other trunks are available

calls.description: A hard limit for the total number calls

inbound_trunks.description: The number of inbound, flat-rate trunks

outbound_trunks.description: The number of outbound, flat-rate trunks

resource_consuming_calls.description: A hard limit for the number of resource consuming calls

twoway_trunks.description: The number of two-way, flat-rate trunks
